languages.text: {n}Голос провидца слаб и дрожит от боли. Странно, что он вообще еще способен говорить — тело его страшно искалечено. Цвета его одежды вам знакомы — такие же носили ксеносы, встреченные вами на Янусе.{/n} "На вершине шпиля. Они все там. Помоги им, Аребенниан. И помоги... мне. Унеси меня отсюда, когда все закончится... Скоро".

traits.locale_text: {n}Голос провидца слаб и дрожит от боли. Странно, что он вообще еще способен говорить — тело его страшно искалечено. Цвета его одежды вам знакомы — такие же носили ксеносы, встреченные вами на Янусе.{/n} "На вершине шпиля. Они все там. Помоги им, Аребенниан. И помоги... мне. Унеси меня отсюда, когда все закончится... Скоро".
traits.speaker: GrandSpecticle_Farseer

languages.text: {n}The Farseer's voice is weak and tremulous from pain. It is strange that he is still capable of speech — his body has been horrifically maimed. The colours of his garb are familiar — the group of xenos you met on Janus wore the same.{/n} "At the top of the spire. They are all there. Help them, Arebennian. And help... me. Take me away from here, when it is all over... Soon."
languages.original_text: {n}Голос провидца слаб и дрожит от боли. Странно, что он вообще еще способен говорить — тело его страшно искалечено. Цвета его одежды вам знакомы — такие же носили ксеносы, встреченные вами на Янусе.{/n} "На вершине шпиля. Они все там. Помоги им, Аребенниан. И помоги... мне. Унеси меня отсюда, когда все закончится... Скоро".

The colours of his garb are familiar — the group of xenos you met on Janus wore the same.{/n} "At the top of the spire. They are all there. Help them, Arebennian. And help... me. Take me away from here, when it is all over... Soon."
traits.speaker: GrandSpecticle_Farseer

languages.text: {n}由于痛苦，先知虚弱的声音一直在颤抖着。他的身体被残害得不成样子，但这种情况下，他竟然还能说得出话来。他的服装看起来很熟悉，你在加努斯遇到的那些异形也穿着这样的服装。{/n}“在尖塔塔顶，他们都在上面。帮帮他们吧，独角。还有，帮帮……我，带我离开这里。这一切都会结束……很快就结束了。”
languages.original_text: {n}The Farseer's voice is weak and tremulous from pain. It is strange that he is still capable of speech — his body has been horrifically maimed. The colours of his garb are familiar — the group of xenos you met on Janus wore the same.{/n} "At the top of the spire. They are all there. Help them, Arebennian. And help... me. Take me away from here, when it is all over... Soon."

traits.locale_text: {n}由于痛苦，先知虚弱的声音一直在颤抖着。他的身体被残害得不成样子，但这种情况下，他竟然还能说得出话来。他的服装看起来很熟悉，你在加努斯遇到的那些异形也穿着这样的服装。{/n}“在尖塔塔顶，他们都在上面。帮帮他们吧，独角。还有，帮帮……我，带我离开这里。这一切都会结束……很快就结束了。”
traits.speaker: GrandSpecticle_Farseer

languages.text: {n}La voz del vidente es débil y tiembla de dolor. Te sorprende que aún pueda hablar con el cuerpo tan horriblemente mutilado. Los colores de su ropa te resultan familiares: los xenos que encontraste en Janus usaban los mismos.{/n}«En lo más alto de la aguja. Están todos allí. Ayúdalos, Arebennian. Y ayúdame... a mí. Llévame lejos de aquí, cuando todo acabe... pronto».
languages.original_text: {n}The Farseer's voice is weak and tremulous from pain. It is strange that he is still capable of speech — his body has been horrifically maimed. The colours of his garb are familiar — the group of xenos you met on Janus wore the same.{/n} "At the top of the spire. They are all there. Help them, Arebennian. And help... me. Take me away from here, when it is all over... Soon."

Los colores de su ropa te resultan familiares: los xenos que encontraste en Janus usaban los mismos.{/n}«En lo más alto de la aguja. Están todos allí. Ayúdalos, Arebennian. Y ayúdame... a mí. Llévame lejos de aquí, cuando todo acabe... pronto».
traits.speaker: GrandSpecticle_Farseer

languages.text: {n}先見司の声は弱々しく、痛みで震えている。この状態でもまだ喋れること自体が驚きだ…その身体はずたずたに切り刻まれているというのに。彼の法衣の色に見覚えがある。ヤヌスで出会った異種族の集団が同じものを着ていた。{/n}「尖塔の上に全員いる。彼らを助けてくれ、アーベニアン。そして…私も助けてほしい。すべてが終わったら、私をここから連れ出してくれ…頼んだぞ」
languages.original_text: {n}The Farseer's voice is weak and tremulous from pain. It is strange that he is still capable of speech — his body has been horrifically maimed. The colours of his garb are familiar — the group of xenos you met on Janus wore the same.{/n} "At the top of the spire. They are all there. Help them, Arebennian. And help... me. Take me away from here, when it is all over... Soon."

traits.locale_text: {n}先見司の声は弱々しく、痛みで震えている。この状態でもまだ喋れること自体が驚きだ…その身体はずたずたに切り刻まれているというのに。彼の法衣の色に見覚えがある。ヤヌスで出会った異種族の集団が同じものを着ていた。{/n}「尖塔の上に全員いる。彼らを助けてくれ、アーベニアン。そして…私も助けてほしい。すべてが終わったら、私をここから連れ出してくれ…頼んだぞ」
traits.speaker: GrandSpecticle_Farseer

languages.text: {n}Die Stimme des Runenpropheten ist schwach und zittrig vor Schmerz. Es ist sonderbar, dass er überhaupt noch sprechen kann — sein Körper wurde grauenhaft entstellt. Die Farben seines Gewands sind dir vertraut — die Gruppe von Xenos, der du auf Janus begegnet bist, trug dieselben.{/n}"Oben auf dem Turm. Sie sind alle dort. Helft ihnen, Arebennian. Und helft ... mir. Bringt mich von hier fort, wenn alles vorüber ist ... Bald."
languages.original_text: {n}The Farseer's voice is weak and tremulous from pain. It is strange that he is still capable of speech — his body has been horrifically maimed. The colours of his garb are familiar — the group of xenos you met on Janus wore the same.{/n} "At the top of the spire. They are all there. Help them, Arebennian. And help... me. Take me away from here, when it is all over... Soon."

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Stimme des Runenpropheten ist schwach und zittrig vor Schmerz. Es ist sonderbar, dass er überhaupt noch sprechen kann — sein Körper wurde grauenhaft entstellt. Die Farben seines Gewands sind dir vertraut — die Gruppe von Xenos, der du auf Janus begegnet bist, trug dieselben.{/n}"Oben auf dem Turm. Sie sind alle dort. Helft ihnen, Arebennian. Und helft ... mir. Bringt mich von hier fort, wenn alles vorüber ist ... Bald."
traits.speaker: GrandSpecticle_Farseer

languages.text: {n}La voix du Grand Prophète est faible et tremblante de douleur. Au vu des horribles mutilations qu'il a subies, le simple fait qu'il arrive encore à s'exprimer tient du miracle. Les couleurs qu'il porte vous sont familières : ce sont celles du groupe de xénos que vous avez rencontré sur Janus.{/n} « Au sommet de la tour. Ils sont tous là. Aidez-les, Arebennian. Et... aidez-moi. Emmenez-moi loin d'ici, quand tout sera terminé... Bientôt. »
languages.original_text: {n}The Farseer's voice is weak and tremulous from pain. It is strange that he is still capable of speech — his body has been horrifically maimed. The colours of his garb are familiar — the group of xenos you met on Janus wore the same.{/n} "At the top of the spire. They are all there. Help them, Arebennian. And help... me. Take me away from here, when it is all over... Soon."

traits.locale_text: {n}La voix du Grand Prophète est faible et tremblante de douleur. Au vu des horribles mutilations qu'il a subies, le simple fait qu'il arrive encore à s'exprimer tient du miracle. Les couleurs qu'il porte vous sont familières : ce sont celles du groupe de xénos que vous avez rencontré sur Janus.{/n} « Au sommet de la tour. Ils sont tous là. Aidez-les, arebennian. Et... aidez-moi. Emmenez-moi loin d'ici, quand tout sera terminé... Bientôt. »
traits.speaker: GrandSpecticle_Farseer

languages.text: {n}Çektiği acılar yüzünden Ötesezen'in sesi zayıf çıkıp titriyor. Hâlâ konuşabilmesi bile acayip... Vücudu korkunç bir şekilde yaralanmış. Giydiği kıyafetlerin rengi tanıdık geliyor... Janus'ta karşılaştığın zeno grubunun kıyafetlerinin aynısından giyiyor.{/n} "Kulenin en üstündeler. Hepsi orada. Onlara yardım et Arebennian. Hem... Bana da yardım et. Yakında... İşin bitince beni buralardan uzaklara götür..."
languages.original_text: {n}The Farseer's voice is weak and tremulous from pain. It is strange that he is still capable of speech — his body has been horrifically maimed. The colours of his garb are familiar — the group of xenos you met on Janus wore the same.{/n} "At the top of the spire. They are all there. Help them, Arebennian. And help... me. Take me away from here, when it is all over... Soon."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ötesezenin sesi zayıf düşmüş ve çektiği acılar yüzünden titriyor. Hâlâ konuşabilmesi bile acayip... Vücudu korkunç bir şekilde yaralanmış. Giydiği kıyafetlerin rengi tanıdık geliyor... Janus'ta karşılaştığın zeno grubu da aynısını giyiyordu.{/n} "Kulenin en üstündeler. Hepsi orada. Onlara yardım et Arebennian. Hem... Bana da yardım et. İşin bitince beni buralardan uzaklara götür... Yakında."
traits.speaker: GrandSpecticle_Farseer
